error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Boolean'. Did you mean 'boolean'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
computedPropertyNames21_ES6.ts(5,6): error TS2465: 'this' cannot be referenced in a computed property name.

==== computedPropertyNames21_ES6.ts (1 errors) ====
    class C {
        bar() {
            return 0;
        }
        [this.bar()]() { }
         ~~~~
!!! error TS2465: 'this' cannot be referenced in a computed property name.
    }
